mapper.select: SELECT qa_seq, title, contents, writng_de, answer, member_seq ,IF(ISNULL(answer), '답변대기', '답변완료') as state FROM qa_tb WHERE member_seq = #{member_seq} ORDER BY writng_de DESC LIMIT #{pageCnt}, 10

SELECT a.qa_seq as qa_seq ,a.writng_de as writng_de ,IFNULL(IFNULL(b.name,b.kakao_nickname),b.facebook_name) as name ,a.title as title ,a.contents as contents ,a.answer as answer FROM qa_tb AS a INNER JOIN member_tb AS b ON a.member_seq = b.member_seq
WHERE a.answer IS NULL
ORDER BY writng_de DESC LIMIT #{pageCnt}, 10
